trans-unit.source: Contains classes that support interoperation of Windows Forms and WPF controls.
trans-unit.target: Enthält Klassen, die die Interoperation von Steuerelementen in Windows Forms und WPF unterstützen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration> namespace contains classes that enable interoperation between the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies.
trans-unit.target: Die <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration> -Namespace enthält Klassen, die Interoperation zwischen ermöglichen die [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] und [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] Technologien.

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration> classes, you can host [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based applications.
trans-unit.target: Bei Verwendung von <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration> Klassen, die Sie hosten [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] Steuerelemente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] Seiten und [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] Elemente im [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-basierenden Anwendungen.

trans-unit.source: The two key classes that implement interoperation capabilities are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>.
trans-unit.target: Zwei wichtigsten Klassen, die interoperation Funktionen zu implementieren sind <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> und <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>.

trans-unit.source: Which class you use depends on your control implementation:
trans-unit.target: Die verwendete Klasse hängt von der Implementierung des Steuerelements ab:

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page.
trans-unit.target: Verwenden der <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> Klasse bei der Verwendung muss ein [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control für eine [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] Seite.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
trans-unit.target: Verwenden der <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> Klasse bei der Verwendung muss ein [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] Element in einer [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]--basierten Anwendung.
